title: Why does vayne get reduced damage from leona's ult but lee sin does not??
body: I mean, ok, vayne has got sunglasses, but lee is blind and with his eyes completelly covered. That is unfair also for other champs like Rek'sai (that doesnt even have eyes), Lissandra (covered eyes as well), maybe Bard (has he got eyes? not sure) and all the commando skins.

replies.body: i think is becouse lee isn't blind for real he just pretend to be blind to have the disabled's pension
beacouse leona do a lesbian porno with vayne u.u
